Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium graminearum and Fusarium verticillioides (MIC<30 Âµg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has weak antifungal activity, but not against A. consortiale Botrytis cinerea, H. sativum, F. culmorum, C. graminicola and D. maydis.
